data.eml:eml: Two new Typhloreicheia species from Sardinia and their biogeographical significance (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Scaritinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Casale, Achille, Marcia, Paolo (2011): Two new Typhloreicheia species from Sardinia and their biogeographical significance (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Scaritinae). ZooKeys 134: 15-31, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.134.1707, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.134.1707
